{{Infobox actor | name = Jasper Harris | image = | imagesize = | caption = | birthname = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1996|6|7|df=y}} | birth_place = [[London]], [[England]], [[UK]] | othername = | occupation = [[Actor]] | years_active = 2003âpresent | website = }} '''Jasper Harris''' (born June 7 1996) is a [[United Kingdom|British]] television and [[film actor]]. He was born in [[London]], UK.
Harris, who earlier received two small supporting roles in [[BBC]] productions, had his leading role debut in the [[religion|religious]] drama ''[[Have No Fear: The Life of Pope John Paul II]]'', in which he plays the 10-year-old [[Pope John Paul II|Karol Wojtyla]]. He recently finished his role as John in the Spanish film ''Los TotenWackers''. During the premier of his last movie he decided to stay home in London. His most well known role was as Bo in ''[[The Thief Lord (film)|The Thief Lord]]'' a [[Cinema of the United Kingdom|British]] / [[Cinema of Germany|German]] film based on the top selling [[children's book]] of the same name by [[Germans|German]] author [[Cornelia Funke]].
He has a sister, Rosa, and a brother, Zack. ==Filmography== * ''Hear the Silence'' ([[2003 in film|2003]]) ([[TV film]]) as Sam Wakefield (uncredited) * ''[[Messiah (TV series)|Messiah: The Promise]]'' ([[2004 in television|2004]]) ([[TV series]]) as Young Brother * ''[[Have No Fear: The Life of Pope John Paul II]]'' ([[2005 in film|2005]]) (TV film) as 10 year old Karol Wojtyla * ''[[The Thief Lord (film)|The Thief Lord]]'' ([[2006 in film|2006]]) as Bo * ''Los Totenwackers'' ([[2007 in film|2007]]) as John
